frontMatter.title: Harnessing AWS IAM and Terraform for Enhanced Cybersecurity
frontMatter.summary: An old-timer's guide to using Terraform to manage who gets to touch what in your AWS account. Learn about IAM users, policies, groups, and roles without falling asleep.

authorDetails.occupation: CISSP, CKS, AWS Certified Security – Specialty, Microsoft Cybersecurity Architect Expert
